knimeNode.name: Echo File Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Select a file within a directory that contains Labcyte Echo 550 files.

fullDescription.intro:
This node reads one result files (.xml) of the Acoustic dispensing (Labcyte Echo 550). This is done by searching for '.xml'-files recursively within the specified directory.
The node reads data provided by Labcyte Echo 550.
fullDescription.option: The XML document to read. It can be a local file on disk or a URL.

option.name: Split Destination Well column in two rows

fullDescription.option: Choose this if you want to have Destination Well in two separate columns (original Destination Well column preserved)

option.name: Split Source Well column in two rows

fullDescription.option: Choose this if you want to have Source Well in two separate columns (original Source Well column preserved)

ports.outPort: A table which contains data from Labcyte Echo 550.
